# MapContext Overview

2022-07-03 18:44

Call [my.createMapContext](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_createmapcontext) to obtain a MapContext instance. A MapConext instance is bound with a map component through its ID. Manipulate the corresponding [map component](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/component_map_map) through MapContext.

## Methods

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Option** | **Description** |
| [MapContext.clearRoute](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_clearroute) | Clear the walking route on the map. |
| [MapContext.gestureEnable](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_gestureenable) | Enable or disable all gestures. |
| [MapContext.getCenterLocation](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_getcenterlocation) | Get the center location of the current map. |
| [MapContext.moveToLocation](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_movetolocation) | Display the pinned location at the center of the map and restore the default zoom level. Use this method together with the _show-location_ method of the map component. |
| [MapContext.showRoute](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_showroute) | Show the default walking route planned. Only one route is displayed. |
| [MapContext.showsCompass](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_showcompass) | Set the visibility of the compass. |
| [MapContext.updateComponents](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/api_map_updatecomponents) | Update the map API incrementally. |
